languages.text: "Флейта поет без слов, но мне интересно, о чем рассказывает твоя мелодия".
"A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."
languages.original_text: "Флейта поет без слов, но мне интересно, о чем рассказывает твоя мелодия".

traits.locale_text: "A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."
"A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."
"A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."
"A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."
"A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."
"A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."

languages.text: « Une flûte n'a nul besoin de mots pour chanter, mais j'ai hâte de voir ce que votre mélodie va nous raconter. »
languages.original_text: "A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."

traits.locale_text: « Une flûte n'a nul besoin de mots pour chanter, mais j'ai hâte de voir ce que votre mélodie va nous raconter. »

languages.text: «Una flauta no necesita palabras para cantar, pero siento curiosidad por la historia que narra su melodía».
languages.original_text: "A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."

traits.locale_text: «Una flauta no necesita palabras para cantar, pero siento curiosidad por la historia que narra su melodía».

languages.text: 「フルートの演奏に歌詞はないが、君のメロディがどんな物語を語るのか興味があるな」
languages.original_text: "A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."

traits.locale_text: 「フルートの演奏に歌詞はないが、君のメロディがどんな物語を語るのか興味があるな」

languages.text: “虽说音乐不需要话语来表达，但我还是很好奇这个曲子讲述的是什么样的故事。”
languages.original_text: "A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."

traits.locale_text: “虽说音乐不需要话语来表达，但我还是很好奇这个曲子讲述的是什么样的故事。”

languages.text: "Eine Flöte braucht keine Worte, um zu singen, aber ich bin neugierig, welche Geschichte Eure Melodie erzählt."
languages.original_text: "A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Flöte braucht keine Worte, um zu singen, aber ich bin neugierig, welche Geschichte Eure Melodie erzählt."

languages.text: "Flütün şarkıları için sözlere ihtiyacı olmasa da melodinin ne hikâyeler anlattığını merak ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "A flute needs no words to sing, but I am curious to know what story your melody tells."
